channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NSF and Simons Foundation launch 2 AI Institutes to help astronomers understand the cosmos

item.title: Reducing smartphone use increases work satisfaction

item.title: Moderate coffee and caffeine consumption is associated with lower risk of developing multiple cardiometabolic diseases, new study finds

item.title: Earth's continents survived billions of years thanks to wind and rain

item.title: A wobble from Mars could be sign of dark matter
item.description: Watching for changes in Mars' orbit over time could be new way to detect passing dark matter, according to researchers.
